DOC.brief_title: A Single Dose Study Of The Safety And Investigational Product Level Measurement In Healthy Subjects

DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Treatment investigational drug within 30 day ( determined local requirement , whichever long ) 5 halflives precede first dose study medication .
